Oghenechovwe Donald Ekpeki ma ọ bụ Ekpeki Oghenechovwe Donald bụ onye Naijiria na-ede akụkọ ifo na onye nchịkọta akụkọ.

Akụkọ ifo ya na akụkọ ifo ya apụtawo Omenana Magazin, Cosmic Roots na Eldritch Shores, Tor.com, Strange Horizons, Uncanny Magazine, NBC na ndị ọzọ.
Ọ bụ onye otu Afrikan Speculative Fiction Society, SFWA, HWA, na Codex Writers Group.
